summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of the Engineering Department to execute agreements with the Transportation Improvement Board for Transportation Improvement Account grant funds for design activities on the 15th Avenue West Pedestrian Signal Improvement Project and the South Spokane Street Lower Roadway Project; authorizing the acceptance and deposit of grant funds to be received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1994 annual budget of the Engineering Department and making reimbursable appropriations from the Transportation Fund.
